titleStmt.title: The summe of the foure Euangelistes comprehending both the course of the historie, and also the seuerall points of doctrine set foorth in the same pointing foorth as it were with the hand, that Iesus is Christ, the only, perfect, and sufficient Sauiour of all the faithfull. Written in Latine by the reuerend, learned, and godly father, Master Henrie Bullinger minister of the Church of Zurich. Translated into English for the profite of the vnlearned by Iohn Tomkys.
titleStmt.author: Bullinger, Heinrich, 1504-1575.
Tomkys, John.

publicationStmt.publisher: [By T. Dawson] for William Ponsonby at the signe of the Bishops head,

notesStmt.note: At foot of title page: Seene and allowed according to her Maiesties iniunctions.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the Bishops head
